Text.Page:
The Lokians...still annoying, but still potentially lucrative.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:18#22#Lokian priests}, {@LinkCreature:18#23#Lokian magisters}, {@LinkCreature:18#24#Lokian sanguinars}, and {@LinkCreature:18#114#Teseku of Blood}.

Dorinne in Sietch Bidaum offers a bounty on broken Lokian weapons.
You're here for the bounty? Terrific!
Kill Lokians, then collect cash. You can't reverse the order, <PCNAME>.
